summary: Dependency vulnerability in ajv 5.5.2 (transitive dependency) with CVSS score 5.6 allows prototype pollution through crafted JSON schemas. Issue was automatically closed after the vulnerable library was removed or ignored.
userImpact: Users may be at risk if untrusted JSON schemas are validated using the vulnerable ajv library version.
rootCause: Ajv 5.5.2 is vulnerable to prototype pollution attacks through carefully crafted JSON schemas in the validate() function.
proposedFix: Upgrade ajv to version 6.12.3 or later
resolutionDetails: The vulnerable library was removed from the Mend inventory or marked as ignored in the project dependencies.
keyQuote: A carefully crafted JSON schema could be provided that allows execution of other code by prototype pollution.
